trans-unit.source: Sign in to the online [Microsoft Azure Preview portal](https://portal.azure.com/).
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the online [Microsoft Azure Preview portal](https://portal.azure.com/).

trans-unit.source: In the Jumpbar, click **New**, then click **Data + Storage**, and then click **Azure DocumentDB**.
trans-unit.target: In the Jumpbar, click **New**, then click **Data + Storage**, and then click **Azure DocumentDB**.

trans-unit.source: ![Screen shot of the Azure preview portal, highlighting the New button, Data + storage in the Create blade, and Azure DocumentDB in the Data + Storage blade][1]
trans-unit.target: ![Screen shot of the Azure preview portal, highlighting the New button, Data + storage in the Create blade, and Azure DocumentDB in the Data + Storage blade][1]

trans-unit.source: In the **New DocumentDB account** blade, specify the desired configuration for the DocumentDB account.
trans-unit.target: In the **New DocumentDB account** blade, specify the desired configuration for the DocumentDB account.

trans-unit.source: ![Screen shot of the New DocumentDB blade][3]
trans-unit.target: ![Screen shot of the New DocumentDB blade][3]

trans-unit.source: Once the new DocumentDB account options are configured, click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Once the new DocumentDB account options are configured, click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: It can take a few minutes for the DocumentDB account to be created.
trans-unit.target: It can take a few minutes for the DocumentDB account to be created.

trans-unit.source: To check the status, you can monitor the progress on the Startboard.
trans-unit.target: To check the status, you can monitor the progress on the Startboard.

trans-unit.source: ![Screen shot of the Creating tile on the Startboard - Online database creator][4]
trans-unit.target: ![Screen shot of the Creating tile on the Startboard - Online database creator][4]

trans-unit.source: Or, you can monitor your progress from the Notifications hub.
trans-unit.target: Or, you can monitor your progress from the Notifications hub.

trans-unit.source: ![Create databases quickly - Screen shot of the Notifications hub, showing that the DocumentDB account is being created - Online database creator notification][5]
trans-unit.target: ![Create databases quickly - Screen shot of the Notifications hub, showing that the DocumentDB account is being created - Online database creator notification][5]

trans-unit.source: ![Screen shot of the Notifications hub, showing that the DocumentDB account was created successfully and deployed to a resource group][6]
trans-unit.target: ![Screen shot of the Notifications hub, showing that the DocumentDB account was created successfully and deployed to a resource group][6]

trans-unit.source: After the DocumentDB account is created, it is ready for use with the default settings in the online portal.
trans-unit.target: After the DocumentDB account is created, it is ready for use with the default settings in the online portal.

trans-unit.source: Note that the default consistency of the DocumentDB account is set to **Session**.
trans-unit.target: Note that the default consistency of the DocumentDB account is set to **Session**.

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the default consistency setting by clicking the **Default Consistency** tile on the **DocumentDB account** blade.
trans-unit.target: You can adjust the default consistency setting by clicking the **Default Consistency** tile on the **DocumentDB account** blade.

trans-unit.source: ![Screen shot of the Resource Group blade][7]
trans-unit.target: ![Screen shot of the Resource Group blade][7]
